items.name: use-boolean
items.title: Use Boolean
items.description: Manage a boolean state with the useBoolean hook, providing methods to set it to true, false, or toggle between them

items.name: use-toggle
items.title: Use Toggle
items.description: Easily manage a boolean state with useToggle.

items.name: use-copy-to-clipboard
items.title: Use Copy To Clipboard
items.description: Use the useCopyToClipboard hook to copy text to the clipboard and track whether the copy action was successful, with an optional delay to reset the copied state.

items.name: use-unmount
items.title: Use Unmount
items.description: Run a function when a component unmounts, ensuring cleanups or final actions are handled effectively.

items.name: use-debounce-callback
items.title: Use Debounce Callback
items.description: Delay function execution with useDebounceCallback, providing options for canceling, flushing, and checking if a call is pending.

items.name: use-isomorphic-layout-effect
items.title: Use Isomorphic Layout Effect
items.description: Custom hook that uses either useLayoutEffect or useEffect based on the environment (client-side or server-side).

items.name: use-interval
items.title: Use Interval
items.description: Execute a callback function at specified intervals with useInterval, supporting dynamic delays and cleanup on unmount.

items.name: use-timeout
items.title: Use Timeout
items.description: Run a callback function after a specified delay with useTimeout.

items.name: use-document-title
items.title: Use Document Title
items.description: Dynamically update the document title. Pass a string, and the document title updates whenever the value changes.

items.name: use-counter
items.title: Use Counter
items.description: Manage a numeric state with useCounter, offering functions to increment, decrement, reset, and set a custom value.

items.name: use-mouse-position
items.title: Use Mouse Position
items.description: Use the useCopyToClipboard hook to copy text to the clipboard and track whether the copy action was successful, with an optional delay to reset the copied state.

items.name: use-battery
items.title: Use Battery
items.description: Track the battery status of a user's device with useBattery.

items.name: use-local-storage
items.title: Use Local Storage
items.description: Store, retrieve, and synchronize data from the browser's localStorage API with useLocalStorage.

items.name: use-session-storage
items.title: Use Session Storage
items.description: Store, retrieve, and synchronize data from the browser's sessionStorage API with useSessionStorage.

items.name: use-fetch
items.title: Use Battery
items.description: Fetch data with accurate states, caching, and no stale responses using useFetch.

items.name: use-script
items.title: Use Script
items.description: Load and manage external JavaScript scripts with useScript.

items.name: use-scramble
items.title: Use Scramble
items.description: Scramble text with the useScramble hook, providing methods to scramble, unscramble, and toggle between them.

items.name: use-intersection-observer
items.title: Use Intersection Observer
items.description: A hook that provides a way to detect when an element enters or leaves the viewport using the Intersection Observer API.

items.name: use-render-count
items.title: Use Render Count
items.description: Identify unnecessary re-renders and monitor update frequency with useRenderCount.

items.name: use-orientation
items.title: Use Orientation
items.description: Manage and respond to changes in device orientation with useOrientation.

items.name: use-window-size
items.title: Use Window Size
items.description: Track the dimensions of the browser window with useWindowSize.

items.name: use-hover
items.title: Use Hover
items.description: Track whether an element is being hovered over with useHover.

items.name: use-media-query
items.title: Use Media Query
items.description: Subscribe and respond to media query changes with useMediaQuery.

items.name: use-interval-when
items.title: Use Interval When
items.description: Create dynamic timers that can be started, paused, or resumed with useIntervalWhen.

items.name: use-countdown
items.title: Use Countdown
items.description: Create countdown timers using useCountdown.

items.name: use-visibility-change
items.title: Use Visibility Change
items.description: Track document visibility and respond to changes with useVisibilityChange.

items.name: use-key-press
items.title: Use Key Press
items.description: Detect and perform actions on key press events with useKeyPress.

items.name: use-cookie-storage
items.title: Use Cookie Storage
items.description: Store, retrieve, and synchronize data from the browser's Cookie Store API with useCookieStorage.

items.name: use-is-client
items.title: Use Is Client
items.description: Determine whether the code is running on the client-side or server-side with useIsClient.

items.name: use-geolocation
items.title: Use Geolocation
items.description: Access and monitor a user's geolocation (after they give permission) with useGeolocation.

items.name: use-page-leave
items.title: Use Page Leave
items.description: Track when a user navigates away from a webpage with usePageLeave.

items.name: use-is-first-render
items.title: Use Is First Render
items.description: Differentiate between the first and subsequent renders with useIsFirstRender.

items.name: use-window-scroll
items.title: Use Window Scroll
items.description: Track and manipulate the scroll position of a web page with useWindowScroll.
